content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 820.7 - Inspection, repair and maintenance

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Transportation adopts part 396 of
title 49 of the

Code of Federal Regulations
with the same
force and effect as through herein fully set forth at length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
820.7

Adopted

New

York State Register June 24, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 25, eff. 7/1/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
